tool_description: Manages and processes company branding assets including logos, fonts, and brand guidelines for invoice template integration.

logo_url.description: URL or path to company logo image

primary_color.description: Primary brand color in hex format (e.g., #FF5733)

secondary_color.description: Secondary brand color in hex format

error_messages: Invalid hex color format: Use format #RRGGBB for color values.
Logo file not accessible: Ensure logo URL/path is valid and accessible.
Company name too long: Keep company name under 100 characters.
Invalid font family: Specify a valid font family name.
Empty company name: Provide a non-empty company name.
usage: Provide company_name and optionally logo_url, colors, and font_family. Processes and validates branding assets for template integration.

brand_package_id.description: Unique identifier for the branding package

processed_assets.description: List of successfully processed branding assets

color_palette.description: Validated color values in hex format

asset_status.description: Processing status: complete, partial, or failed
